definition: Liu Cixin (1963-), Chinese science fiction writer
(classical) a type of battle-ax/to kill/to slaughter

sentences.english: Liu Cixin's writing evokes the thrill of exploration and the beauty of scale.
sentences.chinese: 劉慈欣的作品喚起了人們對探索和宏觀之美的興奮感。

sentences.english: Liu Cixin is quickly becoming one of my favorite authors.
sentences.chinese: 劉慈欣迅速成爲了我最喜愛的作家之一。

sentences.english: Her win comes a year after Liu Cixin won a Hugo for his novel The Three-Body Problem.
sentences.chinese: 就在一年前，劉慈欣的作品《三體》獲得了雨果獎。
